data.name: Kewbii Demo
data.detailed_description: Let's try a lil' portion of Kewbii, complete several levels from different worlds, and discover some game mecanics! Enjoy!
data.about_the_game: Let's try a lil' portion of Kewbii, complete several levels from different worlds, and discover some game mecanics! Enjoy!
data.short_description: Let's try a lil' portion of Kewbii, complete several levels from different worlds, and discover some game mecanics! Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dedicated hardware supporting Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated chipset
